'''Osgiliath Invaded''' is the thirteenth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' and the eighteenth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]]. It was extended in the latter edition.
